bio: I am an Optimism Ambassador (in training), a UI/UX designer, and a writer.
contributionDescription:
Optimistic Alpha is a weekly curation that Provides my audience with on-chain and off-chain activities that can boost their reputation on-chain and also reward them within the Optimism ecosystem.
I have a community where we share Optimism-related alphas. I discovered it was hard for people to keep up with different activities and that's how I gave birth to the OPTIMISTIC ALPHA.
I share these Alphas beyond the community. I put them up on my Mirror, X, and my other socials (Farcaster, FriendTech, and Lens) so as to get to a wider audience.

In my Mirror profile, I have other OP-related articles shared.

Lastly, I held a couple of Twitter Spaces as an Optimism ambassador-in-training with projects building and are willing to build on OP to discuss their project and the importance of RetroPGF.

contributionLinks.description: This is where to find all the weekly alphas and Articles.
Detailed links and info to all my OP articles and Threads
I put up a links to my Twitter spaces with projects in this google doc.

impactDescription:
I have helped Optimists in curating activities that boost their attestations in the Optimism ecosystem. These activities also cut across Base, Zora, and all Superchain-related projects. 

With these activities, users get to contribute and benefit from the ecosystem.

I have also hosted Twitter Spaces which helped projects understand how they can contribute to and benefit from the Optimism ecosystem. 


Total Number of Mirror mints - 11

Total Number of Mirror Subscribers - 16

Total Twitter impressions - 9,160

Total Twitter followers - 2,047

Total Twitter Spaces attendance - 261

fundingSources.description: I've never received any type of funding before

pwCategorySuggestions: Community Building, User Experience & Adoption, Content Creation
